content: *1 standard wire or plastic coathanger + a little yarn + a bit of time = 1 lovely gift lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # plush hanger cover pattern formerly chs-hanger skill level beginner + level 2 super bulky yarn version chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 100 yards crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm bulky yarn version homespun® article #790 1 ball crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm plastic or wire hangers glue or glue gun scissors ribbon some construction required to finish *lion brand notes * use a hook appropriate to the weight of the yarn the smaller hook is for the homespun yarn the larger for the chenille thick and quick project takes approximately 1 hour per hanger
